In the Shadow of the Moon, 20070101080000 +0000, Between 1968 and 1972, the world watched in awe each time an American spacecraft voyaged to the Moon. Only 12 men walked upon its surface and they remain the only human beings to have stood on another world.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: The Apollo Experience: Apollo 17: Part 1, S01E01, Between 1960 and 1972, mankind boldly went where no human had been before. Across 11 manned missions, 24 men flew to the moon and 12 walked upon its surface. This film documents Apollo 17 through the eyes of the astronauts who flew.

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: The Apollo Experience: Apollo 17: Part 2, S01E02, In this episode, hear first hand testimonials and dialogue from the incredible men who walked on the moon. Incredible footage and photos give a unique and beautiful experience of their data collection process and journey home.

programme.title: Living In Space
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Living In Space, S03E01, How do astronauts cope with living in space? The unique environment, the lack of taste in their food and the smell of canned air all contribute to the stresses of living and working in space.

programme.title: Emissaries
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Emissaries, S02E06, Our solar system is vast, from our own star the Sun to Earth is nearly 150 million kilometers or 1 Astronomical Unit.

programme.title: The Moons of Olympis
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Moons of Olympis, S01E07, These are the the Moon's of the gas giants. Each a unique and mysterious world of its own. Some have oceans of water, geysers of Sulphur or atmospheres of plastic.

programme.title: WEBB OF LIFE
programme.desc: The New Frontier: WEBB OF LIFE, S05E08, The James Webb Space Telescope is now operational. Launched aboard an Arianne 5 the 10-billion-dollar spacecraft has deployed successfully and reached its orbit around the Sun.

programme.title: Shore To Shore
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Shore To Shore, S02E04, Our seafaring nature has translated well to the space age, seeking to sail out into the unknown in search of riches of one kind or another.

programme.title: The Ice Giants
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Ice Giants, S01E06, Beyond the asteroid belt lay the ice giants, some can be seen with the naked eye, others only glimpsed once by a passing probe.

programme.title: Martian Attractions
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Martian Attractions, S04E07, The Latest in Martian exploration from orbit and on the ground, new sources of water and planetary dust storms are a few of the stories unfolding on to the Red Planet.

programme.title: Fresh Eyes
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Fresh Eyes, S04E06, Two new space telescopes are in orbit and completing their shakedown; Gaia and TESS they too will be joined by the James Webb Telescope.

programme.title: Danger, Astreroids Ahead
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Danger, Astreroids Ahead, S02E07, The question often rises is the cost of space exploration really worth it? Could the money be better spent elsewhere.

programme.title: First Light
programme.desc: The New Frontier: First Light, S02E08, For an instrument first developed as recently as the 17th century, the telescope has travelled a long way.

programme.title: Science and the Shuttle
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Science and the Shuttle, S03E05, For more than 25 years the shuttle was our ticket to space, and our laboratory in orbit. Uncover the legacy of this amazing machine, and see what lies ahead.

programme.title: Cosmic Rainbow
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rainbow, S02E03, In the world of astronomy, how do we overcome the limits imposed by our own eyesight? The universe comes alive by viewing the cosmos in infrared light to gamma radiation.

programme.title: Cosmic Rays
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rays, S04E04, Cosmic rays can tell us much about the universe. They are not simply another form of light, but carriers of information about powerful and unseen processes at work thousands or even millions of light years away.

programme.title: Borderland / Mars: Red Dawn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E15, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: The Hot Zone
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Hot Zone, S04E03, Mercury is one Earth's closest neighbors, but for centuries it eluded astronomer's best efforts to learn its secrets. But that has changed thanks to missions like Mariner and most recently, Messenger.

programme.title: Virtual Universe
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Virtual Universe, S02E06, Our understanding of the cosmos is limited by the amount of time we have to see it. Fortunately, computer simulations can help us see how galaxies interact over millions of years, and even how dark matter structures the universe.

programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E16, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E06, The murder of a 73-year-old man leads police on a long chase for a man who's suspected of identity theft and bears a rose tattoo with the name "Phyllis".

programme.title: Green River Killer/Missing And The Dead
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E13, In 1982 and '83, Seattle's Green River Killer stalked prostitutes like game. With 49 victims, he could be the deadliest serial killer in U.S. history. Then, a passing motorist spots a fire along a road in South Carolina and calls it in.

programme.title: Hitchhike To Murder / In The Care Of A Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E15, Police must wait nearly 30 years before advances in DNA technology give them the chance to convict the killer of a young hitchhiker, and Philadelphia police wage a 16-year hunt for the man who raped and killed a 10-year-old girl.

programme.title: Blood Money/Precious Doe
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E20, Testimony about the growth of larvae in dead bodies helps convict the man who stabbed a couple to death and strangled their 4-year-old daughter in 1993.

programme.title: Danny Bible/License To Kill
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E21, A Texas woman's murder is finally solved when the killer's plan to kill a second woman and stuff her into a duffel bag goes awry.

programme.title: Bump In The Night/Hitchhike To Murder
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E24, A woman who takes down the license plate number of a car that had been following her helps police solve the murder of another young woman.

programme.title: Mistaken for a Killer/The Boy and the Monster
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E27, Advances in DNA technology that take place over 20 years help police to finally identify the man who brutally stabbed two women to death.

programme.title: Daddy Knows Best/Operation Jambalaya
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E3005, A detective works for 15 years to nab a man who murdered and dismembered his wife to hide the sexual abuse of his children. Then, 20 years after the shooting murder of a gas station attendant, detectives get a lead.

programme.title: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E01, A kidnapper grabs 8-year-old Chad Choice from his home in Texas, then torments his parents with two ransom demands. The case goes cold until the parents receive a chilling package in the mail that contains a letter--and a skull.

programme.title: The Shopping Cart Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E03, A dry cleaning tag inside a sweatshirt left at a crime scene helps police track down a serial killer and rapist who had been eluding them for years.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E09, When a Nevada couple demands the return of a baby they had sold to another couple, the burned body of the baby turns up in Arizona. Then, a man discovers a barrel in his crawlspace that contains the body of a woman who has been dead for decades.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E10, A forensic dentist helps police nab a child killer by showing that the teeth marks on the killer's arms match the teeth of the murdered boy. And telltale blood stains on a blue bandana solve the 10-year-old case of a teenage girl murdered.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E11, Police in Overland Park, Kansas, hunt for over 15 years for a serial killer who lures women to Kansas for sadomasochistic sexual trysts at hotels.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E15, A new fingerprint identification system helps detectives track down a killer after three years of searching. And a Georgia investigator gets to the bottom of a 16-year-old murder case when he discovers the victim's body -- in the bottom of a well.

programme.title: The Flaming Gorge Falls/Caught In The Mail
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E16, A man suspected of the cold case murder of his wife and son hatches a new plot to kill his mother and father; and detectives solve the 20-year-old murder of a teenager by tricking her killer into licking an envelope.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E17, A look at the case of James Allen Selby, a serial rapist who eluded police for years while attacking 11 women in five states - Oklahoma, Nevada, California, Arizona, and Colorado.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E20, A high school janitor is suspected in the murder of a young girl, but with only circumstantial evidence to go on, police must let the case go cold. And a woman asks the police to reopen the 24-year-old case of her cousin's disappearance.
MST3K: Quest Of The Delta Knights, 19980926000000 +0000, Pearl sits in on part of this week's experiment as part of her annual review, and Leonardo da Vinci stops by.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Junior Rodeo Daredevils
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E16, A prank gone wrong leads to children taking on a dangerous new sport.

MST3K: Racket Girls, 20220927050000 +0000, A gym owner gets into trouble, becoming the target of the mob and the law. The 1950 short presents a high school couple rushing into marriage, and the marriage counselor who talks them out of it.
MST3K: Pod People, 19910615000000 +0000, A child adopts a large egg which hatches into a mischievous alien, while a group of pop musicians on a wilderness vacation runs into trouble.

MST3K: Robot Holocaust, 19900113000000 +0000, After the ninth chapter of Radar Men From The Moon (1952) ends in technical difficulties, Joel and the bots must endure Robot Holocaust (1986). They pretend to be characters from the movie, but Tom Servo is the only one who is into it.

MST3K: Robot Monster: MST3K: Robot Monster, 19891223080000 +0000, The guys watch a post-apocalyptic film about aliens and robots, riff on two more installments of "Radar Men from the Moon", and try to understand surrealism.
MST3K: Santa Claus Conquers The Martians, 19911221000000 +0000, Martians abduct Santa Claus and two human children in hopes of bringing Christmas to their planet.

Side Hackers, 19900928000000 +0000, A motorcycle racer and a violent stunt rider start a war of vengeance against each other. Joel and the Bots write a song inspired by the movie and chat with a few characters from the film on the Hexfield.

MST3K: Star Force: Fugitive Alien II, 19911116000000 +0000, Ken and the crew of the Bacchus 3 return in Star Force: Fugitive Alien II (1987) while Joel and the Bots make a Captain Joe action figure and stage a "name that puppet" quiz show.

programme.title: Untamed Youth
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Untamed Youth, S01E12, Joel invents a pipe with a smoke detector and a sprinkler system built in for the invention exchange. The guys watch a 1950s teen flick about youths sentenced to manual labor at a cotton farm.

The Blackwater Lightship, 20040204000000 +0000, Based on the novel by Colm Toibin, The Blackwater Lightship tells the compelling story of reconciliation between three generations of women that has been marked by decades of misunderstandings.

Remember Sunday, 20130421000000 +0000, A down-on-her-luck waitress meets jewelry store clerk, Gus, but complications ensue because of his memory problems. A brain aneurysm three years earlier gives Gus a blank slate the second his alarm wakes him each day.

All Yours, 20160402000000 +0000, Cass, a high-powered attorney and single mother of two, is on the hunt for a new nanny after her precocious kids ran off the last one. Stars Nicollette Sheridan, Dan Payne and Jayne Eastwood.
All for Love, 20170101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. A novelist falls in love with a retired Navy SEAL while writing her newest book.

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E08, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie works her magic to help Sam make a tough decision.

programme.title: A Perfect Match
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E09, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie considers John's adventurous job offer.

programme.title: A Perfect Match, Part 2
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E10, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie reaches a decision about her future.

programme.title: A Budding Romance
programme.desc: Good Witch, S03E01, Hallmark Original Series. The whole town anxiously awaits the impending blooming of the Middleton.

programme.title: Without Magic for a Spell
programme.desc: Good Witch, S03E02, Hallmark Original Series. The Middleton Merriwick is still not in bloom.

programme.title: Day After Day
programme.desc: Good Witch, S03E03, Hallmark Original Series. Two guests arrive at Grey House and are immediately at odds.

programme.title: How to Say 'I Love You!'
programme.desc: Good Witch, S03E04, Hallmark Original Series. The town is caught up in romance when Cassie helps Ben find an old film.

programme.title: Trials of the Heart
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S02E01, Hallmark Original Series. Elizabeth and Jack are closer than ever after their first kiss.

programme.title: Heart and Soul
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S02E02, Hallmark Original Series. Elizabeth and Jack remain worlds apart and Abigail finds the truth about Bill.

programme.title: The Long Goodbye
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E16, The team discover two life pods floating in space. Upon further investigation, the team accidentally transfers the minds of the individuals into Sheppard and Weir. Things get worse when the team discovers the two people are out to destroy the other.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E09, Using the communications stones, Lt. Scott and Camile Wray use their time back on Earth to visit those they’ve left behind. Aboard Destiny, the crew stumbles upon a piece of Ancient technology that carries the promise of a way home.

programme.title: Justice
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E10, Everyone is shocked when a member of the crew is found dead from a gunshot wound. While it appears to be suicide, the gun is nowhere to be found…until it shows up in Col. Young’s (Louis Ferreira) quarters and he becomes the number one suspect.

programme.title: Space
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E11, An alien vessel appears in Destiny’s path and launches an attack, capturing Chloe. Col. Young must use the stones again to get aboard the ship and try to rescue Chloe. He quickly realizes, however, that Chloe isn’t the only prisoner aboard.

programme.title: Divided
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E12, Suspecting an alien tracking device may be hidden somewhere aboard the Destiny, Col. Young and Lt. Scott search the ship’s hull. While distracted by the search, a group aboard the Destiny puts in action a coup that has life-threatening consequences.

programme.title: Descent
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E03, The SG-1 team investigates an abandoned Goa'uld ship orbiting the Earth. While they try to salvage the ship, saboteurs attack and the vessel plummets to Earth, deep into the ocean, with O'Neill and his crew trapped inside…and time running out.

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E04, An alien that might predate human evolution by 50 million years is discovered in Antarctica and may be part of the race that invented the Stargate. After SG-1 manages to thaw her back to life, they discover she may be the source of a deadly virus.

programme.title: Nightwalkers
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E05, When a scientist working on stem cell research disappears, Carter, Teal'c and Quinn investigate and discover that the scientist's town is infested with Goa'uld who can only control the citizens by night. Will Carter, Teal'c and Quinn be taken over?

programme.title: Abyss
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E06, A Goa'uld lord holds O'Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) captive and tortures him for information about the Tok'ra. As O'Neill suffers, Daniel Jackson (Michael Shanks) appears and offers support. Meanwhile, SG-1 races to O'Neill before it's too late.

programme.title: Shadow Play
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E07, Quinn is conflicted when a professor from his home planet asks SG-1 to help stage a coup against the Kelownan government in order to stop a civil war. Should SG-1 allow the planet to destroy itself…or are they placing themselves in needless danger?

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E08, Two scientists working on an off-world research project witness SG-1 captured in a Goa'uld raid and attempt to rescue them. Little do they know that SG-1 staged the capture in order to infiltrate the Goa'uld and make contact with a Tok'ra informant.

programme.title: Allegiance
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E09, The Tok'ra must take refuge from the Goa'uld at the SGC Alpha Site occupied by Jaffa. Bad blood between the races begins to boil as an assassin wreaks havoc on the camp. Can O'Neill stop the bloodshed before the assassin escapes with coordinates?

programme.title: Cure
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E10, SG-1 visits Pangar, a planet inhabited by humans who have developed a drug that makes their immune systems perfect. Unknown to SG-1 is the means by which the drug is produced, a startling discovery that may hold the key to the origins of the Tok'ra!

programme.title: Prometheus
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E11, Rogue NSA officers hijack the X-303 spaceship and demand that Adrian Conrad be brought to the ship. Using his Goa'uld knowledge, Conrad activates the X-303 and takes the ship light-years from Earth as O'Neill and Teal'c stage a daring rescues.

programme.title: Unnatural Selection
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E12, When SG-1 is marooned in deep space, Thor comes to the rescue. He then seek O'Neill's help to combat the Replicators. Convinced they will attack earth if not stopped, O'Neill stages a daring mission to stop the Replicators once and for all.

programme.title: Sight Unseen
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E13, SG-1 returns from a mission with an artifact that triggers the ability to see hideous yet harmless life forms in a parallel reality. As the effect spreads to civilians, O'Neill and his team must find a solution before mass hysteria breaks out.

programme.title: Smoke & Mirrors
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E14, Senator Kinsey suffers an assassination attempt while campaigning for the presidency, and O'Neill is caught on tape leaving the building where the shots were fired. With O'Neill behind bars, Carter, Teal'c and Jonas must prove his innocence.

Christmas with the Andersons, 20151231000000 +0000, The Anderson family always goes all out for Christmas, but this year will be different when Michael loses his job just before the holidays. With wacky Aunt Katie visiting, though, she helps remind them Christmas can be fun with no money.
Dear Santa, 20130101080000 +0000, A young woman who comes from a life of privilege falls for the owner of a soup kitchen after discovering a Dear Santa letter written by his seven year old daughter.
Elfette Saves Christmas, 20191119000000 +0000, When Santa Claus is kidnapped by the New York mafia, Elfette, a special not-so-ordinary elf, must stop the bad guys, find Santa, and save Christmas.

Four Christmases And A Wedding, 20171202000000 +0000, When event planner Chloe (Arielle Kebbel) is hired to plan the local Christmas Festival, she is beyond thrilled to embrace the challenge. Professionally, everything is going great, but much to the dismay of her mother (Markie Post).

Holiday Breakup, 20160101080000 +0000, A couple falls crazy in love, only to break up right before all the big holiday parties. It's Suckville, so they pretend to still be mad for each other instead of mad at each other. It's the perfect plan if they don't fall back in love.
It's a Christmas Thing, 20230101000000 +0000, When 9-year-old Megan dedicates her Christmas wish to helping her mom Cara find love, she enlists the help of their blended family to make it come true.

Lacy's Christmas Do-Over, 20211210000000 +0000, Lacy is a businesswoman disgruntled in the holidays. A mysterious therapist tells Lacy to go to a B&B in Illinois. There she finds herself reliving the same day. Now she must escape this Christmas time warp and find the answers she is looking for.

Rebirth of Mothra 3, 19981212000000 +0000, In the final film in the new 'Mothra' trilogy, King Ghidorah, the most destructive of all the monsters, returns to destroy the Earth. In the end, Mothra is indeed triumphant and takes her place among the greatest of all monsters.

Godzilla Vs. Megaguirus: The G Annihilation Strategy, 20001216000000 +0000, Five years after Godzilla® terrorized the city of Osaka, Japanese scientists have developed a sure-fire way to finally destroy Japan's monster nemesis. Godzilla, Mothra, and King Ghidorah: Giant Monsters All-Out Attack, 20011215000000 +0000, When a series of terrifying natural disasters begin to plague Japan, including the inexplicable offshore sinking of a U.S. submarine, a mystic old man warns his nation that Godzilla has come back to destroy Japan.

Godzilla Against Mechagodzilla, 20021214000000 +0000, After four years of scrupulous preparation under the prime minister, a new invincible robot, Mechagodzilla, has now reached completion, armed with various weapons, including the most powerful gun in history.

Godzilla: Tokyo S.O.S., 20041214000000 +0000, Mechagodzilla, the superior-armed, state-of-the-art, all-robot version of Godzilla, is undergoing repairs after his devastating battle against the world's monsters.

programme.title: Vacation, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E16, While on a vacation cruise, the Baywatch lifeguards encounter high seas hijackers, leaving Mitch and Stephanie stranded in the stormy Pacific, and Summer, Matt, CJ, and Guido faced with outwitting ruthless killers who have overtaken the ship.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E17, An escaped psychopath takes Summer and Stephanie hostage in a lifeguard tower, necessitating a thrilling subterranean rescue attempt by Mitch and Matt.

programme.title: Stakeout at Surfrider Beach
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E18, Mitch finds himself falling for an Italian actress who is being stalked by ruthless robbers. Meanwhile, CJ and Stephanie help Guido pretend to be a lifeguard in order to impress his visiting mother.

programme.title: Shattered, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E19, When he risks his life to save three teenagers, Mitch fractures his spine and is paralyzed. Hobie, Stephanie, and Sophie, his physical therapist, rally to repair his shattered life.

programme.title: Shattered, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E20, Paralyzed during a heroic rescue, Mitch undergoes a vigorous rehabilitation regimen. Meanwhile, Jason, a ten-year-old paraplegic, is pursued by a hitman trying to keep him from testifying against gangsters.

programme.title: Kicks
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E21, Mitch coaches Matt in an amateur kickboxing tournament, but the competition turns deadly when an enemy from Mitch's past gets him into the ring. Meanwhile, CJ, seduced by a fashion photographer, considers leaving Baywatch for a modeling career.

programme.title: Fatal Exchange
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E22, Mitch contends with an unorthodox, risk-taking Australian lifeguard, and rekindles his love affair with a beautiful journalist, Kaye Morgan.

programme.title: Race Against Time, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E01, Mitch's ex-wife flies in for a weekend visit. She introduces her new fiancé Ken and informs Mitch she is taking Hobie back to Ohio with her. When Ken's private jet crashes in the ocean on takeoff, the Baywatch team have to rescue them!

programme.title: Race Against Time, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E02, A dramatic plane crash finds Hobie and his mother trapped in the rapidly flooding fuselage beneath the sea while Mitch and the Baywatch lifeguards mount a massive rescue effort to save the trapped passengers and crew.

programme.title: Lover's Cove
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E03, Romance is in the air at Baywatch as Mitch and Jackie's friendship grows more intense, Summer and Matt begin a relationship, and Hobie falls in love with Lauren, a junior lifeguard with a devastating secret.

programme.title: Blindside
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E04, John D. Cort, Mitch's friend and a former lifeguard, returns to Baywatch where his life undergoes a devastating change. Meanwhile, Hobie meets a very "unique" new friend.

programme.title: Skyrider
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E05, Summer has love problems when Slade returns from a world surfing tour to discover Matt and Summer are dating. CJ is persistently pursued by a bungee jumping balloonist. Meanwhile, Garner patrols the beach on horseback.

programme.title: Tentacles, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E06, A prison break gone awry finds Mitch held hostage by a beautiful woman and forced to perform surgery on her escaped convict husband. Meanwhile, Matt and Slade decide to settle their mutual affection for Summer in a daring surfing contest.

programme.title: Tentacles, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E07, Mitch removes a bullet from an escaped convict, only to realize that he and his wife have every intention of killing him. Stephanie's sister Caroline arrives with her fiancé, who becomes the target of an attempted murder.

programme.title: Submersion
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E08, Mitch saves two boys from drowning. But when one ends up in a coma, Mitch suffers from PTSD and is left reevaluating his life as a lifeguard.

programme.title: Ironman Buchannon
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E09, Mitch's impending birthday prompts him to train for an ironman competition, getting swept off his feet by a younger woman along the way. Matt takes a night job to save money for a motorcycle, jeopardizing his coworkers through his exhaustion.

programme.title: Tower of Power
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E10, A new lifeguard helps Mitch and the Baywatch lifeguards confront an upsurge in gang activity, and CJ is enamored with a beach magician who nearly drowns during a bungled underwater stunt.
